name: EvaluationQuotas
description: Maximum submissions per team/participant per submission round

firstRoundStart.description: The date/time at which the first round begins.

submissionLimit.description: the maximum number of submissions per team/participant per round.  Can be overridden in a specific round to give a different limit.

rounds.description: The array of end-dates (and optional round-specific quotas) for the rounds of the Evaluation.
